bug.author: tabergma
bug.description:
The Travis build on master is failing due to (see <denchmark-link:https://travis-ci.org/zalandoresearch/flair/builds/467919455?utm_source=github_status&utm_medium=notification>console log</denchmark-link> ). Solution Add <denchmark-code>env: - BOTO_CONFIG=/dev/null </denchmark-code>
to as suggested in <denchmark-link:https://github.com/travis-ci/travis-ci/issues/7940>travis-ci/travis-ci#7940</denchmark-link>
